examples: to pick up/lift/put down/replace the receiver
para levantar / levantar / dejar / reemplazar el receptor
To change channel, select the desired number on the receiver unit.
Para cambiar de canal, seleccione el número deseado en la unidad receptora.
They had to lay off 200 staff and call in the receivers.
Tuvieron que despedir a 200 empleados y llamar a los receptores.
